details.message:
`001.007.003 Mk_Workflow_Attributes`
- Test generates workflow attributes.
- Workflow Stages "Stage A", "Stage B", and "Stage C" are created.
- Work Priorities "3-Green", "2-Yellow", and "1-Red" are created.
- "SMCT Workflow Form" is assigned to every Workflow Stage.
details.name: 001.007.003 Mk_Workflow_Attributes
